TopicTitle: Free For All Ultimate Race Car Build Challenge

Articles.Content:
Your mission here is to build the best race car in the entire solar system! By any means necessary!

Cars are judged by these factors:

  • Top speed (points = 5% m/s)
  • Time to circle KSC 3 times (runway and all buildings, score = 90/time in secondsx25)
  • Appearance (0-25 points. judged by me)
  • Special Features ( 1 point for small features like lights/accessories. 5 points for big features like movable parts other than wheels. 10 points for major features like being amphibious/ space ready)

~25 points for each category, ~100 points total (can be more if you're supoer awesome)

All parts/ mods and plugins are allowed, as long as they follow the following guidelines:

  1. It must be be able to support itself by wheels or skids at all times, not wings or thrusters.*
  2. It must be able to accelerate, break and turn. As well as perform those maneuvers multiple times without resetting.
  3. It must be manned
  4. Top speed only counts when the vehicle has been in contact with the ground for the last 1 second.
  5. Your vehicle must compete in all 4 categories without going back to the SPH.
  6. Singular parts do not count for appearance scores (a one-part BMW shell doesn't count)
  7. No plugins or parts that directly affect the vehicle's position or velocity bypassing physics. (Hyperedit)
  8. No plugins or parts that changes the environment of Kerblin.

Infinite fuel and other unrealistic parts allowed, but more points if they are well intergraded with proper appearance and explanation on how and why they work.

*Wings and thrusters are allowed, and you can fly around except that top speed doesn't count unless you have been in contact with ground for the last 1 second. So if you can manage to touch the floor while flying at high speed, go for it. Also if you think you can circle KSC while flying, again, go for it. However your vehicle must be capable of being supported by its wheels/skids at any time while driving.
